40.ara-name: كتاب الإيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Umar:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) passed by a man and he was chastising his brother about modesty, so the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Al-Haya' is part of faith

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الْحَيَاءَ مِنَ الإِيمَانِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About "Al-Haya' (Modesty) Is Part of Faith"
